titleStmt.title: Samuels funerall. Or A sermon preached at the funerall of Sir Anthonie Cope Knight, and Barronnet. By Mr. Robert Harrice
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for Thomas Man, and are to be sold at the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
